name: A Near Dawn: Text Prototype
description:
Have you head of the graphical dark humorous psychological thriller adventure game A Near Dawn? Well, in fact it began as a text-based adventure called Back To Reality! How this came to be is discussed in Update #2 of our ongoing KickStarter campaign!

Some people have shown an interest in taking a look at the modest beginnings of our adventure, so without further ado I present to you:

Back To Reality A Near Dawn: Text Prototype!  :)

Though I developed  a good half of the game like this in Twine before going graphical, to avoid spoilers this version ends where our Prologue does. Maybe I will update it when we release the full game! We hope you check out our graphical Prologue and have a look at how far our project has come and where we plan to take it on our KickStarter Page!
